ExtensionManifest.Abstract:
A custom color wheel extension for Adobe Photoshop.
KalleWheel is an extension that is made to make it easier for digital painters to choose colors in Photoshop.
Features:
HCL (LAB) color space Many colors in the same picker wheel Light source direction indicators
